message.content:
<<<api>>>: JSch
<<<code>>>: 
try {
    ChannelExec channel = (ChannelExec) session.openChannel("exec");
    channel.setCommand("pkill -f 'tail -f'");
    channel.connect();
} catch (JSchException e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
} finally {
    if (channel != null) {
        channel.disconnect();
    }
    if (session != null) {
        session.disconnect();
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can send a command to kill the process before disconnecting. The command "pkill -f 'tail -f'" will kill all processes with 'tail -f' in the command line. This should kill your tail process. After that, you can disconnect the channel and the session.
